page.title: 05A Day in Caroline's Life
page.content: I get up at 7-30am wash,dress and have my breakfast.My mother drives me to school which is 5 miles away.School starts at 9-00am with class registration.Then the whole school goes into assembly.After assembly we return to class and work hard until playtime at 10-40am.When break is over we return to class and work until lunch at 12-00 midday.After lunch we have about an hours play.In the afternoon I go to a different class for project work.We do our project work until 3-00pm when we have story which lasts until school finishes at 3-00pm.When I get home I usually watch television until I have my tea.After tea I read a book or help my mother until it is time for me to go to bed This is usually about 9-00pm.
